newsitem.title: USA: Salant hires ex-Melville executive as CEO.
newsitem.headline: Salant hires ex-Melville executive as CEO.

text.p: Salant Corp on Thursday said it elected Jerald Politzer as its chief executive, effective April 1.
Nicholas DiPaolo, the current chief executive and chairman, will remain as chairman to enable a smooth transition. Politzer was previously executive vice president of Melville Corp, Salant said.
Melville recently changed its name to CVS Corp,
Salant also announced the election of Michael Lubin, previously executive vice president and chief operating officer of Salant, as president and chief operating officer of Salant.
